item.title: Re: villages
item.content:encoded:
It's a slight pain in the butt, but there's a way to do it.

What we have to do is rename the old page away, and allow the new kage to create a new page. They can then copy and paste the entire old page into the new page. That way they'd have the write permissions for the new page.

The wikidot software doesn't make it easier to distribute permissions differently than this for something like the village pages.

item.title: villages
item.content:encoded:
the unimportant: i don't own a village, but lately my hokage has been switched out and it occurred to me that if the only person who has the right to change the villages wiki page is the hokage, what will happen if the hokage switches?

the important: question: is there a system set up for the person who created the village page to give control of it, or at least permision, to another person?
